original_text: Then Jesus called his disciples to him and said, “I have compassion on the crowd because they have been with me now three days and have nothing to eat. And I am unwilling to send them away hungry, lest they faint on the way.”
korean_text: 예수께서 제자들을 불러 이르시되 내가 무리를 불쌍히 여기노라 그들이 나와 함께 있은 지 이미 사흘이매 먹을 것이 없도다 길에서 기진할까 하여 굶겨 보내지 못하겠노라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus called his disciples to him and said, “
I have compassion on the crowd
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이 무리를 불쌍히 여기는 것은

sentences.original_text: because they have been with me now three days
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나와 함께 사흘을 있었기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: And I am unwilling to send them away hungry,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 굶겨서 돌려보내고 싶지 않으니,

sentences.original_text: lest they faint on the way.”
